alert.note: Alert for Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Northern Westchester; Orange; Rockland; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN FAIRFIELD...HUDSON... EASTERN PASSAIC...BERGEN...SOUTHEASTERN ESSEX...WESTCHESTER...EAST CENTRAL ORANGE...PUTNAM...BRONX...ROCKLAND AND NEW YORK (MANHATTAN) COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 646 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Walden to near Greenwood Lake to Victory Gardens. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Yonkers, Paterson, Stamford, New Rochelle, Passaic, White Plains, Mott Haven, Hoboken, Bloomfield, East Tremont, Hackensack, New City, and Orange. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southern Connecticut...northeastern New Jersey...and southeastern New York.

area.areaDesc: Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Northern Westchester; Orange; Rockland; Southern Westchester
